name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
In Lishui City, Zhejiang Province, civil servants are required to submit personal information of their family members and relatives
Failure to submit a truthful report is considered disloyal to the party.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: In Matou Village, Zhuozhou City, Baoding City, local residents announced the actual disaster situation: reporters were not allowed to interview, and 6 bags of instant noodles were provided in four days

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 16, the Luoyang Sui and Tang History Society sent a lawyer's letter to the producers of the film "30,000 Miles of Chang'an", stating that there were four parts of the film that were inconsistent with historical facts🤔️

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizens ask for help
How can ordinary people prepare in advance for the possible financial crisis?

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
Netizen contribution
Xiong'an New Area on August 17, a spotless and deserted city

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Hengyang, Hunan sent out a group of text messages, asking citizens to respond "I'm satisfied, it's safe, I know" when they receive a food safety investigation call.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On August 17, Wuhan University announced that student couples who both hold a marriage certificate can apply for shared dormitories.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
It's a bit humorous.
If you make money, they will say that you do this for money.
But if you don't make money, they will laugh at you for not even making money.
It's just that although I didn't make money, the money that the country "invested" in me may have several more zeros at the end😆

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chen Kaige's new film "Volunteers" sparked protests from netizens for using a "clown" as the poster. Some netizens believe that the "white clothes with red dots" worn by the little girl in the poster symbolize the Japanese flag.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: The film company explained that the poster was intended to reflect the protagonist's humiliating childhood.
